title: Large-Scale Inquiry Community-Based Mathematics Education Design Workshop for Online Teacher Capacity Building

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of secondary-level mathematics fundamentals and basic proficiency in online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Participation-centered design using smartphones, emphasizing digital content creation for math curricula and feedback competencies.

learning_goals: Learners can design online collaborative learning environments using the Community of Inquiry (CoI) framework.
Learners can create and share digital math content using smartphone-based tools.
Learners can improve their instructional design case studies through peer feedback.
Learners can apply strategies to establish social presence in online learning.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
